techniques.name: Sudo Vim
techniques.description: If Vim is allowed to run with sudo, it can execute arbitrary commands via the :! shell escape.

techniques.name: Find SUID
techniques.description: If a SUID binary like find is misconfigured, it can execute commands as the owner (often root).

techniques.name: Python Sudo
techniques.description: If Python is allowed to run with sudo, it can execute arbitrary commands via os.system.
